component_text.text: Skaven Assassins are elite killers in a class of their own. The art of sabotage, arson and poison all form part of their deadly bag of tricks.

upkeep_cost.componentleveltooltip: Upkeep||This amount will be deducted from your {{tr:icon_treasury}}{{tr:treasury}} each turn while this [[img:icon_hero]][[/img]]Hero exists.
